item.title: Acute Injury
item.description: NATURALLY VEGAN: Did you know that most Vitamin D3 comes from lanolin “aka” sheeps wool?! Our Vegan D3 + K2 Full Spectrum is unique because we utilize a sustainably harvested source of cholecalciferol derived entirely from lichen (a vegan source of vitamin D3). This product offers 3-IN-1-SUPPORT using Vitamin D3 along with two essential forms of K2 (MK-4 + MK-7). Unflavored, Soy-Free, Gluten-Free, Alcohol-Free & Non-GMO
